title: Huge and sunny studio front facing!
map_address: West 86th Street near West End Ave
posting_body: ['Choose to hang out at Riverside Park half a block away or Central Park 3.5 blocks distance really amazing location!!!', 'Stunning views of the Hudson and NJ.', 'SPECTACULARLY LARGE 13FT BY 19FT, shared bath, microwave, fridge, hot plate, STUPENDOUSLY HUGE WALK-IN CLOSET.', 'THIS IS NOT A ROOM SHARE; IT IS A REAL APT!!!', 'due to share bath situation with 2 other tenants.', 'Building cleans bathroom every day including Sat, Sun, and holidays!', 'THIS APT IS CLOSEST TO BATHROOM SHARE, SEE PHOTO, YOUR DOOR IS 1 FOOT AWAY FROM BATHROOM.', 'You get a real legal apt lease, real mailbox, and real apt number!!!', 'Elevator building, 24hour doorman, laundryroom, free bike storage.', 'Totally private apt, 500% clean, really livable, and very safe!!!!', 'Feel free to make an appointment, my name is Roger, cell (212) 222-9999', "Broker's fee $2950", 'Rents very fast!!', 'Have a job with provable income, impeccable references, step to the front of the line!!', 'Foreign Students welcome providing properly documented', 'GUARANTOR MAY BE REQUIRED.', 'First come first served.', "Can't touch this pricing for really decent living", '$1175 includes heat, hot water, gas, electric, and this is a 24-hour doorman elevator building!!!', 'Kindly text or call for quick appointment!', 'Roger (212) 222-9999', 'PETS ALLOWED ON A PER CASE BASIS!!!', 'WE ARE BOUTIQUE BROKERAGE ON THE UWS OF MANHATTAN SINCE 1989']
